titleStmt.title: A form of the indulgences, with which our Holy Father Pope Clement IX. blesseth the beads, rosaries, crosses, pictures, or medals, on the occasion of canonizing of St. Peter of Alcantura, and St. Mary Magdalen of Pazzis.
titleStmt.author: Clement IX, Pope, 1600-1669.

titleStmt.title: A form of the indulgences, with which our Holy Father Pope Clement IX. blesseth the beads, rosaries, crosses, pictures, or medals, on the occasion of canonizing of St. Peter of Alcantura, and St. Mary Magdalen of Pazzis.
titleStmt.author: Clement IX, Pope, 1600-1669.
Ricci, Michelangelo, 1614-1682.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
At foot of text: A copy of the original printed at Rome, in the printing-house of the Reverend Apostolick Chamber, 1669. Signed Michael Angelus Riccius, Secretary by permission of superiors.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
